definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: The good prospect of Liaoning lets us be in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧的美好前景讓我們喜不自勝。

sentences.english: The coming prosperity is meant to alter this and permit you to turn fully inside.
sentences.chinese: 即將到來的繁榮會讓你喜不自勝。

sentences.english: He watched the wheel whirling past the number and experienced a burst of exaltation .
sentences.chinese: 他瞧着輪子轉過一個個數字，心中喜不自勝。

sentences.english: He was transported with joy to hear those words.
sentences.chinese: 他聽了那些話喜不自勝。

sentences.english: I am laughing aloud, and finally to move this pile of books I do not have a dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 我喜不自勝，終於不用我搬這堆書回宿舍了。

sentences.english: The workers were transported with joy.
